open parentheses 3 squared close parentheses squared space x space space open parentheses 3 to the power of 4 close parentheses squared
equals 3 to the power of 2.2 end exponent space space x space space 3 to the power of 4.2 end exponent
equals 3 to the power of 4 space x space space 3 to the power of 8
equals 3 to the power of 4 minus 8 end exponent
equals 3 to the power of negative 4 end exponent
